orig_text: Table 1: Default RFD Parameters of Juniper and Cisco
correct_text:
Table 1: The default RFD parameters for Cisco and Juniper 
         provided for the information of the reader.
notes: The RFC Editor Note (resulting from Barry and Benoit's DISCUSS) documented at https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-ietf-idr-rfd-usable/writeup/ has been forgotten.
